name: js-template-engine
description: A dynamic templating engine that translates Typescript/JavaScript or JSON data into structured templates across multiple languages.

scripts.build: pnpm --filter @js-template-engine/core build && pnpm --filter "@js-template-engine/extension-*" build && pnpm --filter @js-template-engine/cli build
